Celebrating World Autism Awareness Day
3  April,  2024
Best Buddies Qatar celebrated World Autism Awareness Day at the awareness corner in the Ramadan Bazaar on Pearl Island. Volunteers from the Qatar National Library read stories to visitors at the corner, along with volunteers from Northwestern University. Sweets were distributed and sponsored by Sablé, and balloons were given to young visitors. The corner received a total of 151 visitors during April.
